response.overview: Heiress Joanna Stayton hires carpenter Dean Proffitt to build a closet on her yacht—and refuses to pay him for the project when it's done. But after Joanna accidentally falls overboard and loses her memory, Dean sees an opportunity to get even.
response.tagline: From opulence... to rags... to love.
response.title: Overboard

titles.title: Overboard – Ein Goldfisch fällt ins Wasser
